moreBlocks.lawyersAtJensenLaw,LLCSelectedForASuperL: • Burkhart, Jessica On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
Our team at Jensen Law, LLC, is committed to serving injured and accused parties in Atlanta. We are primarily known as accident lawyers, but our Georgia cases expand far beyond just this. Some additional cases handled by our law firm include construction accidents, workers' compensation, medical malpractice and brain injury.

When you go up against your employer or an insurance company, it will stand ready with professionals to advise it. We believe it is important for injured parties to begin negotiations and court cases with the same level of support. This does not guarantee that you will win the case, but it increases the odds of fairness.

At Jensen Law, LLC, we have had successes across a wide range of cases. These are the ones we are most proud of:

  • $3.1 million for a client who crashed into the back of a pulled-over box truck
  • $1.2 million settlement for a rider injured in a motorcycle crash
  • $325,000 for security guard injured on the job
  • $149,000 workers' compensation settlement after a fall on the job

Our commitment to helping you build a strong case and to winning begins with a free consultation. If you are Hispanic and feel worried that a language barrier may negatively affect your case, rest assured that we speak Spanish.
